original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 15:23:53' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 23:26:14' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-11-16 01:27:37' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-21 15:25:23' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=5 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 20:31:48' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.AnswerCount >= 0 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 15:23:53' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 23:26:14')
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2.Id=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 20:31:48'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E5.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-11-16 01:27:37' AND CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-21 15:25:23'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E5E6.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 5
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E6E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E5E6E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E6E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E5E6E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E5E6E3E4.Id)
